headline: Ask HN: Anybody know if Apple M1 chip support iGPU passthrough?
description:
Does anybody know if Apple M1 chip supports iGPU passthrough (like Intel GVT-g.. https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Intel_GVT-g) or sharing with a virtual machine?

Last year I did a hobby project on my Intel MacBook where I passed through the shared iGPU to a windows VM running on Linux and it worked very well with minimal performance penalty after full optimizations. I don't even know if AMD supports this feature, but would Apple M1 support it? Thanks
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 有谁知道苹果M1芯片是否支持iGPU穿透？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 有誰知道蘋果M1芯片是否支持iGPU穿透？
description_zh-Hans:
有谁知道苹果M1芯片是否支持iGPU直通（像英特尔GVT-g...https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Intel_GVT-g）或与虚拟机共享？

去年我在英特尔MacBook上做了一个业余项目，我把共享的iGPU直通到在Linux上运行的windows虚拟机上，在充分优化后性能损失很小，效果非常好。我甚至不知道AMD是否支持这一功能，但苹果M1是否支持？谢谢
description_zh-Hant:

去年我在英特爾MacBook上做了一個業餘項目，我把共享的iGPU直通到在Linux上運行的windows虛擬機上，在充分優化後性能損失很小，效果非常好。我甚至不知道AMD是否支持這一功能，但蘋果M1是否支持？謝謝
